Package org.kmfahey.jchessgame

Record Class MovesLog.MoveError

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
org.kmfahey.jchessgame.MovesLog.MoveError
Record Components:
moveObj - The Move object that was formed in error.
issueFlag - An integer flag representing the type of error made, one of MovesLog.MoveError.WOULD_BE_IN_CHECK, MovesLog.MoveError.IS_IN_CHECK, MovesLog.MoveError.NOT_A_VALID_MOVE, MovesLog.MoveError.IS_A_FRIENDLY_PIECE, MovesLog.MoveError.CASTLING_INTERVENING_SPACE_OCCUPIED, MovesLog.MoveError.CASTLING_KING_IN_CHECK, MovesLog.MoveError.CASTLING_PATH_IS_THREATENED, or MovesLog.MoveError.CASTLING_PIECE_HAS_MOVED.
Enclosing class:
MovesLog
public static record MovesLog.MoveError(Chessboard.Move moveObj, int issueFlag) extends Record
Implements a record that represents an error made in the course of picking a move to play in the chessgame this program runs.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    CASTLING_INTERVENING_SPACE_OCCUPIED
    Flag, that castling is illegal because an intervening space is occupied.
    static final int
    CASTLING_KING_IN_CHECK
    Flag, that castling is illegal because the king is in check.
    static final int
    CASTLING_PATH_IS_THREATENED
    Flag, that castling is illegal because a square on the way is threatened.
    static final int
    CASTLING_PIECE_HAS_MOVED
    Flag, that castling is illegal because a square on the way is threatened.
    static final int
    IS_A_FRIENDLY_PIECE
    Flag, the move captures a friendly piece.
    static final int
    IS_IN_CHECK
    Flag, the king is in check and this move doesn't fix that.
    static final int
    NOT_A_VALID_MOVE
    Flag, the move is illegal for the piece.
    static final int
    WOULD_BE_IN_CHECK
    Flag, move would place the king in check.
